attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the government say our armed forces are over streched  why not bring back national service 2yrs for people who are unemployd,or the ungratefull youth of today,
 our armed forces used to be the best in the world is about time this government done something to help our boy and girls of the armed services yet again the youth of today, have no respect time to give them a leason 2yrs national service. i think the government will be suprised on how many would continue to serve after the 2 yrs stint is done i joined the services in the 70s and the number of pepole i come across who were national servicemen then was suprising so get the yobs off our streets and get them to do something for their country

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
